name: Camper Dealers, Recreational and Utility Trailers
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell new and used campers and recreational and
utility trailers. Products for sale may also include automobile travel
trailers, pop-up tent trailers, and related parts and accessories.
For motor home dealers, use MCC 5592.
